pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: High-level introduction to the trip management and logistics monitoring system, its purpose, and core capabilities

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: Comprehensive overview of the system's architectural patterns, layers, and design decisions

pages.title: Domain Model
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of business entities (Trips, Vehicles, Routes, etc.), their relationships, and lifecycle

pages.title: UI Component Architecture
pages.purpose: Overview of UI patterns, component hierarchy, and design system principles

pages.title: State Management Strategy
pages.purpose: Explanation of the dual state management approach using Zustand and React Context

pages.title: Data Access and Repository Pattern
pages.purpose: Documentation of the repository pattern, API communication, and authentication flow

pages.title: External Integrations
pages.purpose: Overview of integrations with HERE Maps, Sofia AI, and backend services

pages.title: Trip Management System
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the core trip management functionality, the most critical system in the application

pages.title: Trip Lifecycle and Status Management
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of trip status transitions, state machine, and lifecycle rules

pages.title: Trip Details View
pages.purpose: Documentation of the trip details UI component, its features, and interactions

pages.title: Trip Creation Flow
pages.purpose: Step-by-step documentation of the trip creation process, including Sofia recommendations

pages.title: Trip Editing
pages.purpose: Documentation of trip modification capabilities, validation rules, and update workflows

pages.title: Trip List and Sidebar
pages.purpose: Documentation of the trip browsing interface, filtering, search, and card display patterns

pages.title: Risk Assessment System
pages.purpose: Detailed documentation of risk calculation, display, and Sofia AI integration

pages.title: Real-time Monitoring
pages.purpose: Documentation of live trip tracking, location updates, and polling mechanisms

pages.title: UI Component Library
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of reusable UI components, patterns, and styling system

pages.title: Modal System
pages.purpose: Documentation of CenterModal, LateralModal, and specialized modal implementations

pages.title: Table Components
pages.purpose: Documentation of the generic table system used across entity management screens

pages.title: Card Components
pages.purpose: Documentation of Card and CardExtended components for trip display

pages.title: Form Components and Validation
pages.purpose: Documentation of form inputs, validation patterns, and user input handling

pages.title: Styling System and Design Patterns
pages.purpose: Documentation of SCSS module patterns, responsive design, and visual design system

pages.title: Entity Management Modules
pages.purpose: Documentation of CRUD operations for non-trip entities: vehicles, routes, containers, operators, devices, companies

pages.title: Fleet Management
pages.purpose: Documentation of vehicle, operator, and device management functionality

pages.title: Route Management
pages.purpose: Documentation of route creation, editing, geofence management, and polyline handling

pages.title: Container Management
pages.purpose: Documentation of container tracking and management functionality

pages.title: Company and Account Management
pages.purpose: Documentation of company hierarchy, factory locations, and account administration

pages.title: License and Protection Management
pages.purpose: Documentation of license levels, assignment, purchase flow, and protection capabilities

pages.title: State Management Deep Dive
pages.purpose: Detailed documentation of all state management patterns, stores, and contexts

pages.title: Zustand Store System
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of all Zustand stores, their purpose, and usage patterns

pages.title: React Context System
pages.purpose: Documentation of domain-specific React contexts and their access patterns
